1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: "In the Trenches" is the all Pennsylvania high school sports talk show. Richie Blyweiss sits down with football analysts, Corey Sharp and Michael Palmer, to talk about what's going on, on the football side of the PIAA. "In the Trenches" airs Mondays, Live, on The Sports Fan Base Network's Facebook Page.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Thanks for tuning in to the 2nd episode of In the Trenches. This week, our hosts talks about the big games that happened over the weekend during week 2 of the high school football season. Games mentioned: District 1 - Abington vs Cheltenham District 1 - North Penn vs Pennsbury District 12 - St. Peter's vs St. Joe's District 12 - Malvern Prep vs La Salle District 10 - Erie Cathedral Prep vs McDowell District 11 - Parkland vs Liberty District 7 - Pitt. Central Catholic vs North Allegheny District 4 - Mt. Carmel vs Southern Columbia "In the Trenches" is the all ...

Teams / Games mentioned: District 1 - Bensalem HS vs Abington District 1 - Central Bucks South vs Central Bucks East District 1 - Pennridge vs Souderton District 2 - Scranton vs North Pocono District 3 - Wyomissing District 3 - Berks Catholic District 3 - Cumberland Valley vs Bishop McDevitt District 3 - Central Dauphin vs Wilson West Lawn District 7 - Pine Richland vs Penn Hills ...
